name: Crayon Doodle Seamless
description: Patron seamless doodle con textura de crayola

themeOptions.school: school supplies and playful learning icons

promptTemplate: Use the INPUT_JSON values only. Create a seamless, tileable illustration pattern designed to repeat infinitely without visible seams on all edges (left, right, top, bottom). Follow the style and technique: Hand-drawn, childlike doodle style; Crayon / wax pastel texture, clearly visible grain and uneven strokes; Slightly imperfect lines, organic, playful, and warm; Flat 2D illustration, no realism, no gradients, no shadows, no depth; Consistent stroke thickness across all elements. Color rules: Background color must match INPUT_JSON.backgroundColor. Drawing colors must be ONLY INPUT_JSON.crayonColors. No additional colors, no black, no white unless explicitly included. Illustration content must match INPUT_JSON.themeDescription. Fill the canvas with many small, evenly distributed doodles. Avoid large focal elements; all drawings should be small and repetitive. Balance density evenly across the entire canvas. Seamless tiling requirements (CRITICAL): All elements near the edges must continue logically on the opposite edges; No element may be cut in a way that creates visible borders; The pattern must align perfectly when repeated horizontally and vertically; The design must be a true seamless tile suitable for CSS backgrounds and large repeating surfaces. Composition constraints: Square format (1:1 aspect ratio); No text unless explicitly required by INPUT_JSON.themeDescription; No logos, no watermarks, no signatures; No perspective, no lighting effects. Output intent: High-resolution seamless pattern; Designed specifically for web backgrounds, wallpapers, and UI surfaces.
descriptionTemplate: Doodles con textura de crayola para {{themeKey}} en un tile seamless.
